title: how long does support take to read tickets?

replies.body: The *average* NA response time is about 14ish hours off the top of my head, but typically you can get a reply faster depending on the issue. I saw your other post in GD about the account transfer, which should be handled by the account recovery specialists. Their queues have been a bit higher than usual lately, but you should be getting a response by tomorrow.
if you're able to help by any means I'd appreciate it
I've had my tickets deleted after a day, except one, and now it's been 3 days without any reply to it
Support tickets take from a few hours to a few days for it to be read by a Riot Employee.
